CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 15, 1959, pg. A1, reads: "Charge People From Other Areas Chief Cause of 3rd Ward's Filth and Stench - Sanitary Problems - Irresponsibility on the part of some residents of the Third Ward and outside visitors, the city refuse department and city health inspectors have allowed unsanitary conditions to arise in some areas of the Third Ward... The right photo shows trash which residents said has been in this Clark Street area for quite some time. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Overgrown sidewalk with trash and debris piled against wall, and men standing in background, Clark Street, Hill District
